sections.title: What Is Isybank and How the Bonus Works
content: Isybank is a digital banking app that allows you to open current accounts and manage your payments easily and securely.
By participating in the 'Refer a Friend 2.0' initiative, you can receive a ‚Ç¨30 Amazon Gift Card by opening a Plan and entering the referral code, no deposits or purchases are required.

sections.title: Main Requirements
content: Download the Isybank app and activate a plan (isySmart or isyPrime) between 08/11/2025 and 31/03/2026. The isyPrime plan is free for under 35s.
Enter the referral code within 15 days of opening the Plan and no later than 15/04/2026.
The Amazon Gift Card will be delivered by 31/07/2026 only if the Plan is active at the time of delivery.

sections.title: Step-by-Step Guide
content: 1. Download the Isybank app and register.
2. Complete the registration and verify your identity according to the app instructions (required documents: ID card, driving license, or passport).
3. Enter the referral code within 15 days of opening the Plan (and no later than 15/04/2026).
4. Once your participation is verified, the ‚Ç¨30 Amazon Gift Card will be sent within a few weeks.
